name: Rightful
description:
A Tower Defense with a cycle of 10 seconds. An unstoppable horde of monsters tries to drive you from this newly found island, but with the help of a plethora of towers you will need to defend yourself, gather resources and expand your island.

New Enemies are at your gates every 10 seconds. Your resources are stocked up every 10 seconds.

With a fully randomly generated map and path, you never know what to expect!

— Controls —

Move Camera: AWSD/Arrow Keys Rotate Camera: Q & E Zoom Camera: Scroll Wheel

Use your mouse to select and place the buildings.

— Explanation —

At the start a map is randomly generated for you. From this point onwards you have 10 seconds between every wave of enemies. You can place gatherers over natural resources to increase your income, and you can place towers to defend yourself. Finally, by placing a watch-tower, you will expand your island, but be warned, it will also create an additional path for your enemies to take.

Made for Ludum Dare 51
